segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message and to transmit function, type and number of the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time of the preparation of the message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to indicate a message reference number.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the liner service operating or responsible for a particular vessel/voyage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the means of transport and related details.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to identify a means of transport and discharge voyage number.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the locations to which the following information applies.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time of events in local time, else the time zone specifier is to be used.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify the loading voyage number.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to transmit general information about vessel/voyage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: SG4 A group of segments containing information about the equipment and/or goods and its stowage location onboard a vessel.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations relevant to the equipment or goods carried.

segment.name: Goods item details
segment.documentation: GID, A segment to identify the number of packages of the goods.

segment.name: Nature of cargo
segment.documentation: GDS, A segment to identify or specify the goods carried.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to transmit goods descriptions, additional equipment details or other relevant free text.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical weights related to an equipment detail or a goods item detail.

segment.name: Dimensions
segment.documentation: DIM, A segment to identify off standard measurements (e.g. overheight, overlength etc.).

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to indicate the temperature setting in relation to an equipment detail.

segment.name: Range details
segment.documentation: RNG, A segment to transmit a temperature range in relation to an equipment detail.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the locations (ports) to which the given information applies.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to give additional information on equipment or goods carried (i.e. equipment expected to be shifted at the next port).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments containing information about the type of equipment.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to identify a single piece of equipment to which the following information applies. Only transport equipment size/type coded or plain language is used here further to identify the equipment.

segment.name: Attached equipment
segment.documentation: EQA, A segment to identify details of equipment attached to the main piece of equipment.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the owner/operator of a particular piece of equipment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments containing information about dangerous cargo.

segment.name: Dangerous goods
segment.documentation: DGS, A segment to identify dangerous goods related to an equipment detail.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to give additional information concerning dangerous goods.
